float &  correctedHadronicEnergy 
) [static]

Correct energy of clusters containing muon hits, by addressing issue of energy loss in the coil.

Parameters:
pCluster address of the cluster
correctedHadronicEnergy the current corrected hadronic energy measure, which may be modified by this function

void FineGranularityEnergyCorrections::CleanCluster ( const pandora::Cluster *const   pCluster,
float &  correctedHadronicEnergy 
) [static]

Correct cluster energy by searching for constituent calo hits with anomalously high energy.

Corrections are made by examining the energy in adjacent layers of the cluster.

Parameters:
pCluster address of the cluster
correctedHadronicEnergy the current corrected hadronic energy measure, which may be modified by this function

StatusCode FineGranularityEnergyCorrections::ReadSettings ( const pandora::TiXmlHandle  xmlHandle  )  [static]

Read the energy corrections helper settings.

Parameters:
xmlHandle the relevant xml handle

void FineGranularityEnergyCorrections::ScaleHotHadronEnergy ( const pandora::Cluster *const   pCluster,
float &  correctedHadronicEnergy 
) [static]

Correct cluster energy by searching for clusters with anomalously high mip energies per constituent calo hit.

Corrections are made by scaling back the mean number of mips per calo hit.

Parameters:
pCluster address of the cluster
correctedHadronicEnergy the current corrected hadronic energy measure, which may be modified by this function
